page.title: 11HILLFOOT FARM
page.content: The farm is about 540 acres.It is owned by Mr.Derek Harris who grows wheat,barley,peas and grass.He doesn't keep any animals. He has many machines, a lot of tractors,some are crawlers and one is a special narrow-tyred tractor that won't crush the corn as it travels. He bought a new combine harvester this year for Â£48,000. Mr.Harris has only his son Stephen to help him on the farm.His busiest time is from mid-July to mid-October when he is harvesting. When we asked him what he liked about the farm he said it was the open-air life and the freedom of being his own boss and seeing the results of his work. He especially likes harvesting the crops after all the labour of the year's work.
